snippet: The Triple Crown prospect Top Billing cracked his right front cannon bone in a workout and is off the Triple Crown trail.
abstract: Thoroughbred racehorse Top Billing is off the Triple Crown trail after cracking his right front cannon bone in a workout, though long-term prognosis seems good; other horse racing news noted.
lead_paragraph: The Triple Crown prospect Top Billing cracked his right front cannon bone in a workout and is off the Triple Crown trail.
